info.name: puris-integration-test
info.description:
The collection assumes the following roles:

- Customer PURIS (upper tier)
    
- Supplier PURIS (lower tier)
    

It creates the opposite partner and the respective view on the semiconductor material or product.

To run the tests correctly, take the environment and fill the respective secrets:

- CUSTOMER_EDC_API_KEY
- CUSTOMER_PURIS_BACKEND_API_KEY
- SUPPLIER_EDC_API_KEY
- SUPPLIER_PURIS_BACKEND_API_KEY
    

When using the another environment, update / create a new environment.

exec: pm.test("Verify response contains two objects", function () {
// Put found value into foundValues to ensure that each value is only found once
pm.test("Verify partner values (BPNL with one BPNS with one BPNA)", function () {

pm.test("Verify response contains one stock", function () {

pm.test("Verify stock composition LA (material number with BPNS, BPNA and Partner BPNL)", function () {
